meaning_str.bing:
n. 屋顶；车顶；顶部；有…顶的
v. 给…盖顶；盖上屋顶
网络. 房顶；楼顶；屋脊

屋顶；（房间的）天顶；（建筑物内部的）最高点；顶棚；顶盖；穹顶；天花板；保护层；车顶；隧道顶
覆盖；遮蔽；作为…的顶部；给…盖顶；为…提供避难所

1.en: Not every company is ready to let social networks under its roof.
1.cn: 不是每家企业都是做好准备让社交网络公司内部有立足之地。

2.en: The latest deaths include a six-year-old girl, hit by a sniper on Wednesday on the roof of her parents' apartment, he said.
2.cn: 他还说，最近死于冲突的人里面还有一名6岁的小女孩，星期三的时候她被她父母所住公寓楼顶上的一名狙击手击中。

3.en: It was a terrible scene, and Anzheluo uplink walk on the roof, but as it sets, jumped out of the death to light tones, bright and calm.
3.cn: 那是一副可怕的景象，而安哲罗在屋顶上行走着，却如同这死亡的布景里跳出的亮色，耀眼而平静。

0.en: A soap opera roof party?! I'm going to a soap opera roof party! Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
0.cn: 肥皂剧屋顶派对！我要参加肥皂剧屋顶派对！喔，我的天啊！好了，发泄完了。

1.en: It has been very stormy weather and the school roof is leaking. How can we raise the money to fix the school roof? We could have a fun run.
1.cn: 最近的天气总是雷雨交加，学校的屋顶总是漏雨。我们要怎样才能筹到钱，把屋顶修一修呢？我们可以举办募捐长跑。

2.en: It is a rainy day and the school roof has a hole in it.
2.cn: 今天是个雨天，学校的屋顶上出现了一个洞。

3.en: I'll put the roof up. Ooh, And let's get the heating on.
3.cn: 我来把屋顶放高点。噢，我们把暖气打开吧。

4.en: Look. It is going to drop a drip. You need a new roof. Oh dear, where are we going to get the money for a new school roof? We can do the school fete to get the money.
4.cn: 看，这个在滴水。你需要一个新屋顶。哦，天哪，我们去哪里筹钱做一个新屋顶呢？我们可以办学校义卖会来筹钱。

5.en: There's a loud banging noise coming from the roof. It is Father Christmas.
5.cn: 屋顶有很重的脚步声！是圣诞老人！

6.en: How about on the roof? What's the matter, Potter? Bit beyond your reach?
6.cn: 屋顶上怎么样？怎么啦，波特，是不是够不着啦？

7.en: George. There's a loud banging noise coming from the roof. It is Father Christmas.
7.cn: 乔治！屋顶有很重的脚步声！是圣诞老人！

8.en: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Mr. Bull is checking the school roof. Who put this roof on for you? You did. Mr. Bull. Lovely job, it will last your a lifetime. But it is leaking water.
8.cn: 佩奇和她的朋友们在游乐场。公牛先生正在查看学校的屋顶。是谁之前帮你们放置这个屋顶的？是你啊，公牛先生。做得真好，它可以用一辈子。但是现在在漏水。

9.en: I say. Look at those big boot prints. And there's more of the same boot prints on our roof.
9.cn: 你们看！好大的靴子脚印啊！我们的屋顶也有相同的脚印！

10.en: Oh, that would be so much fun. We could decorate the roof and make the guys wear tuxedos.
10.cn: 那应该会很好玩吧，我们可以布置一下屋顶，让他们穿晚礼服。

11.en: And you, you're the one having the affair with the guy who keeps the pigeons on the roof. Phoebe. Secret affair.
11.cn: 你跟在屋顶上养鸽子的男人有一腿。菲比。那是秘密。

12.en: What's this? That's a dog, every house should have a dog. Not one that can pee on the roof.
12.cn: 这是什么？狗狗，每栋房子都应该有狗，不能大到可以在屋顶上撒尿。

13.en: Oh dear. The roof window is not closed. Catch it Grandpa. I can't, Peppa, it's in the sky.
13.cn: 哦，天哪！屋顶窗户没有关。抓住它，爷爷。我抓不住，佩奇，它在天上。

14.en: What? What? What's going on? Joey is having a secret Days of Our Lives party up on the roof!
14.cn: 什么？这是怎么回事？乔伊帮《我们的日子》在屋顶举行秘密派对。

15.en: Thank you, children. And we have raised enough money to buy a new school roof again. Hooray.
15.cn: 谢谢你，孩子们。而且，我们筹到了足够多的钱来买一个新的屋顶了。好耶。

16.en: George has let go of his balloon again. Don't worry George, it won't fly away because the roof is in the way.
16.cn: 乔治又把他的气球放走了。不要担心，乔治，它不会飞走的，因为上面有屋顶。

17.en: Children. We are going to have a jumble sale. The money we raise will pay for a new school roof. Hurray.
17.cn: 孩子们，我们将要举办一场义卖活动，义卖所得的钱，可以帮我换一个新的屋顶。太棒了！

18.en: May I have a red one? How much is it? How much have you got? Oh, of course. We are rasising money for the school roof.
18.cn: 我能要一个红色的吗？你有多少钱？多少钱？哦，当然，我们在为学校的屋顶筹钱。

19.en: I will behave. Please, Please, please. Okay, fine. you can come. But don't tell anybody else. It's up on the roof at 8.
19.cn: 我会克制自己，拜托。好啦，你可以参加。但是不要告诉其他人，八点钟在屋顶上面。
